Name: Guardian of Immortal Mountain(仙山守卫者)
About the game: Plot Summary There are many animals living under the immortal mountains. Monsters attack the mountain one day. They summon a magic tower to collect the animals' souls and turn them into monsters. The player plays an immortal apprentice and needs to use his own abilities. The weapons, as well as the four protection towers left behind by the immortals, protect the animals in the mountains. About the game It is a action VR shooting game. Use your weapon to attack monsters and save the animals. Feature 1. Swing Arm to Move In Vr. 2. Two Weapon Switch. 3. Magic Energy to Use On tower to Get Magic.
